en.help: 💬 I help you to instantly translate your text to any language and give out in both text and voice, just use me inline and click the desire option, this is an example #ja
en.start:
Hello {}👊,
I can help you to translate anything inline instantly to text or voice!

{} to learn more about bot
{} to list all language ISO codes
{} to change deafult translation language
{} to change separator symbol
en.sepa_404: ⚛️ Current Separator {} You can set your own custom separator using /sepa or /separator symbol, must be within (~!@#$%:^;&*-_+=>?|.) Example /sepa $
en.lang_list: 🈶 List of all languages and its code :
en.to_lang: 🌎 Current default language is {} To change the translation conversion language send /tolang or /defaultlang langcode Example /tolang ja
